ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: And it is undeniably the Truth of Certainty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And He, He is indeed the ultimate Reality.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Certainly it is a Truth of absolute certainty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: This is the Truth beyond any doubt.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And indeed it is a certain Truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And verily, it (this Qur'an) is an absolute truth with certainty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And most surely it is the true certainty
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: yet indeed it is the truth of certainty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And lo! it is absolute truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And verily it is the truth of assured certainty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But verily it is Truth of assured certainty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And Verily, it (this Quran) is an absolute truth with certainty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: yet it is a certain truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Yet it is the absolute truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And indeed, it is the truth of certainty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [69:51] And assuredly it, that is, the Qur’ān, is the certain truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And lo! It) i.e. the Qur'an (is Absolute Truth) it is truly and certainly My speech which Gabriel took down to an illustrious messenger; it is also said that this means: and that which I have mentioned of the disbelievers' anguish and remorse is true and certain; such anguish and remorse on the Day of Judgement will surely take place.
